name: Eclipse (Toxic Mask)
description:
Lost in Space... You must find computer chips to survive.

Your Ship is damaged and it needs 5 computer chips to work.

Use you proximity radar to find the chips in the void of space.

Look out for AIR! Loot Dead Astronauts for Oxygen or refill in your Space Ship.

Controls:

WASD - Movement.

LeftCrtl / SPACE - Interact ( Refill Oxygen Tank / Repair your Space Ship )
